text: van Maanen 2, also called Van Maanen's Star, is a white dwarf star and the closest white dwarf to the Sun that does not have a companion. It is larger than the Earthhttps://arxiv.org/abs/1811.08902 but is two-thirds the mass of the Sun.https://arxiv.org/abs/1505.02297 It is 14 light years away and is in the constellation Pisces.ISBN 0-486-23673-0 It was once a star larger and hotter than the Sun (like Sirius) that became a red giant before becoming a white dwarf. == References == Category:Stars Category:Pisces (constellation)
title: Van Maanen 2
